title: Predigital V Poster Font
content:
I came across this font on the poster in the 1980s miniseries V. Can anyone help identify it. It was likely predigital and so probably has some pedigree. Any advice, as always, appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020525im_/http:/typophile.com/files/V--friendship_universal_5485.jpg)
author: James Gareth

comments.content: This seems very familiar. I’m surprised someone hasn’t nailed it. Can someone suggest alternatives?
Closest I really know of is [20th Century](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020525/http:/www.fontstock.net/10588/20th-century-font.html)
